Let’s be real, yea, he can’t act that way BUT some of these fans think just because they buy a ticket that they can say or do whatever they want.

Miles ain’t doing something like that for no reason https://t.co/d44xoDaq3q

I’m exaggerating here, a little bit, but I believe that I could score 15 points against this Hornets defense. 

It’s like the parting of the Red Sea
